item.title: Mysql cheat sheet
item.description: This is a small sql cheat sheet i keep. It contains super basic operations (create, select, delete). I am using Mysql for demo here but there would be some difference with sqlite or postgresql. Start Mysql Link to heading to connect to server for first time, you need to connect as root sudo mysql Create user and add privileges Link to heading CREATE USER 'user'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password' mysql> GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.
